titles.title: Providing for the designation of certain minority employees.

action.text: Mr. Frost asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Passed House without amendment. Names six persons as minority party employees pursuant to the Legislative Pay Act of 1929. Authorizes the minority leader to appoint and set the annual rate of pay for up to three additional minority employees.
